OMNI-HEAT: Our patented Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for outdoor performance. The interior lining consists of our metallic dot pattern designed to retain heat, while the breathable fabric dissipates moisture.
OMNI-TECH: Our proprietary technology provides air-permeable protection that’s waterproof and breathable, keeping mother nature’s elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.
WATERPROOF SNOW PANTS: Made for warm breathable comfort, these popular winter snow pants are made with advanced materials, designed to deliver alpine performance you’ll appreciate all day.
KEEPS THE SNOW OUT: Perfect for skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, and other winter activities, our Powder Stash Snow Pants include bottom leg zips for better fit around your boots, with internal leg gaiters, and durable Hammerhead reinforced cuffs.
HANDY FEATURES: These snow pants include easy exterior waist adjustments, articulated knees, two cargo pockets, zippered hand pockets, jacket and pant connectors, leg venting for active sports and days with wild swings in temps.

item.title: Columbia Men’s Bugaboo IV Pant
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Engineered for the active outdoor enthusiast, the Columbia Men’s Bugaboo II pants are the perfect blend of form, function, and practicality. Designed as a modern classic with universal fit for a comfortable range of motion, these men’s winter snow pants feature exterior adjustable waist tabs to snug your pants for ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $80.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:27 UTC – Details)


Engineered for the active outdoor enthusiast, the Columbia Men’s Bugaboo II pants are the perfect blend of form, function, and practicality. Designed as a modern classic with universal fit for a comfortable range of motion, these men’s winter snow pants feature exterior adjustable waist tabs to snug your pants for the perfect fit and reduce the potential of snow sneaking under the waistline. These outdoor pants have been designed for snow skiers, snowboarders, mountain climbers, and winter sports enthusiasts who are looking for comfortable, waterproof, breathable snow pant. Our Omni-HEAT thermal reflective dots regulate temperature, using space-blanket technology to reflect and retain your body heat, while still allowing a high level of breathability and interior airflow. Additional features, including internal leg gaiters, zippered hand pockets, and lower leg snap gussets, permit you to easily slip these pants over boots and wear insulated undergarments, keeping the snow out for maximum warmth and dryness. These men’s winter pants come in multiple colors and range of sizes. Available in extended sizing. Active and Regular Fit. To ensure you get the right size, please refer to our sizing chart. To measure the waist correctly, measure around your natural waistline, allowing the tape measure to sit comfortably. For the hips, measure around the fullest part of your hips. And for the correct inseam, measure from the top of the interior leg to the bottom of the ankle. Imported.  Shell: 100% nylon. Lining and insulation: 100% polyester.  Zippered closure.  Machine Wash.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17 x 15 x 4 inches; 1 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1864311
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 20, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Columbia (Sporting Goods)
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07J6TDX1L

Button closure
Machine Wash
OMNI-HEAT: Our patented Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for outdoor performance. The interior lining consists of our metallic dot pattern designed to retain heat, while the breathable fabric dissipates moisture
OMNI-TECH: Our proprietary technology provides air-permeable protection that’s waterproof and breathable, keeping mother nature’s elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions
WATERPROOF SNOW PANTS: Made for warm breathable comfort, you can embrace fresh powder days in these ergonomic-fit snow pants built with thermal-reflective lining and synthetic insulation
KEEPS THE SNOW OUT: Perfect for skiing, snowboarding, and snowmobiling, our Bugaboo IV Pants are critically seam-sealed to keep water out, while you keep dry and well ventilated
HANDY FEATURES: Designed for the perfect fit, these snowboard pants include easy exterior waist adjustments, reinforced and articulated knees, a cargo pocket, zippered hand pockets, and lower leg snap gussets

These pants have light insulation to offer extra warmth along with the protection of a waterproof shell. With thoughtful details like an adjustable waist, internal leg gaiters, and zippered front hand pockets meet your mountain needs.

Read more

Perfect for skiers, snowboarders, and winter mountain climbers. Whether you’re a winter athlete or not, these advanced waterproof snow pants will keep you comfortable and dry in any weather.

These snow pant features a breathable, ventable, waterproof shell, combined with our heat-keeping reflective lining. These thermal reflective dots regulate temperature, using space-blanket technology to reflect and retain your body heat.

Engineered for easy exterior waist adjustments on the go, articulated knees offer a comfortable fit with a wide range of motion.

Designed with the elements you need, these snowboard pants feature zippered pockets to keep your gear secure, internal snow gaiters, and adjustable cuff-guards elevate a warm and dry experience.

Read more

Omni-Heat | Thermal Reflective Warmth

Magic in a little silver dot that reflects body heat. Omni-Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for performance in the outdoors. The metallic dot patterns are designed to retain heat, while the rest of the lining consists of highly breathable fabric that dissipates moisture and excess heat.

Omni-Tech | Waterproof & Breathable

Air-permeable protection that’s waterproof and breathable. This proprietary technology provides excellent waterproof protection, keeping mother nature's elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe. The result is outerwear that keeps you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.

Waist 29-32" 32-35: 36-39" 40-43" 44-47"
Size 32" 32" 36" 40" 44"

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Be prepared for whatever your workday has to offer in this sporty, yet professional womens scrub set. Stay on-trend in this modern uniform that includes a tuck-in scrub top and slim-fit jogger scrub pant. Built to last, this wrinkle resistant, non-see-through fabric is machine washable and will hold up after ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:31 UTC – Details)


Be prepared for whatever your workday has to offer in this sporty, yet professional womens scrub set. Stay on-trend in this modern uniform that includes a tuck-in scrub top and slim-fit jogger scrub pant. Built to last, this wrinkle resistant, non-see-through fabric is machine washable and will hold up after multiple washings. This versatile womens scrub top can be worn tucked in or out for a variety of trendy looks. The slim-fit jogger scrub pant features an elastic jogger hem and a full elastic and full drawstring closure waistband that stays secure on the waist. Offering a 93% Polyester and 7% Spandex blend with reinforced seams and stitching, designed to make you feel comfortable with four way stretch material. The perfect blend of style, comfort, and fit.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.5 x 10.28 x 1.5 inches; 11.78 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 817
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Green Town
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BL418C7Q

Drawstring closure
2-PIECE SET: Be work-ready in the affordably priced GT 4FLEX scrub set. The tuckable V-Neck uniform top offers one chest pocket and one utility pocket to help hold your gear. The jogger scrub pant features two slash hip pockets and two cargo pockets, a drawstring, and an elastic waist band that adjusts to your fit. Experience maximum comfort in this lightweight, extremely soft material. Perfect for any nurse, doctor, physician assistant, dentist, med student, and more!
FUNCTIONAL YET FASHIONABLE: If you are looking to add fashion and functionality to your uniform collection, this scrub set is just for you! Pairs perfectly with joggers, the cute & trendy scrub top can be worn both tucked and untucked to add versatility to your look. Dress this jogger pant up or down, perfect for working out or lounging around on your days off. The ultimate uniform for all women healthcare professionals, the super-soft construction of this scrub set will make it your new go-to!
USEFUL FEATURES: This scrub set is a must-have essential! This womens uniform set comes equipped with 6 functional pockets overall. Ideal for the medical field, the scrub top features a spacious chest pocket and a convenient utility pocket for your instruments. Also offering side vents created for increased mobility and ease of movement. Pockets for the pants are 2 functional slash hip pockets and 2 convenient utility cargo pockets. Meet all your storage needs with maximized pocket space.
WASH AND WEAR: Machine Wash Safe, Easy To Clean, Dries Fast, and Shrink Resistant! Built to last, this high-quality fabric is machine washable and will hold up after multiple washings. Maintain a clean and professional look in this wrinkle resistant, non-see-through fabric. Be crease and crinkle free with little to no ironing needed!
STRETCH FABRICATION: A high-quality, soft, and breathable fabric made to move when you move. Offering a 93% Polyester and 7% Spandex blend constructed with reinforced seams and stitching. Designed to make you feel comfortable, this top provides extra-durable, four way stretch material. Ensure lasting comfort and wider range of motion throughout your entire workday.

Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:31 UTC – Details)

item.title: PGA TOUR Women’s Pull-on Golf Pant with Tummy Control (Size X-Small-Xx-Large)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Get ready to hit the course in style in these PGA TOUR women’s golf pants. Made with plain weave fabric for durability, these golf trousers for ladies are sure to stand up to regular wear and will definitely become a favorite piece in your golf wear with all its performance ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $43.49
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:42:45 UTC – Details)


Get ready to hit the course in style in these PGA TOUR women’s golf pants. Made with plain weave fabric for durability, these golf trousers for ladies are sure to stand up to regular wear and will definitely become a favorite piece in your golf wear with all its performance features. Moisture-wicking technology helps you stay dry and confident as you play as it moves perspiration away from your skin. Sun protection prevents damaging UV rays from penetrating the fabric of the golf apparel. Performance stretch in the material lets you swing, bend and crouch in total comfort with a maximum range of motion. The design of the pull-on golf pants makes it quick and easy to get ready and the ladies slacks feature built-in shapewear at the tummy for a slimming effect that smooths your figure. A mid-rise cut sits just above the hips while vents in the hem of the pants provides a better fit with your golf shoes so that the golf pants don’t bunch up at the bottom. Two side pockets and a back pocket, give you plenty of room to keep your tees, balls and more close at hand. Not only are these ladies trousers for golf great to wear on the course with a PGA Tour golf shirt, they are also perfect to wear out and around town with a blouse or tee.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5 x 5 x 0.7 inches; 11.36 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PVBF7011
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 7, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PGA Tour Women’s Athletic
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B073JMDFHN

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash

PERFORMANCE STRETCH: The innovative material of the women’s golf slacks is made to stretch, allowing for a wider range of unrestricted movement and greater range of motion as you play.
SUN PROTECTION: Sun protection prevents damaging UV rays from penetrating the fabric of the golf trousers to help protect covered skin on sunny days.
